payload.question: What is Clickeen?
payload.answer: Embeddable widgets with conversions built in.

payload.question: Is there a free plan?
payload.answer: Yes, one active widget with core features.

payload.question: How do I install a widget?
payload.answer: Copy the embed code and paste it before </body> on your site.

faqs.question: What is Clickeen?
faqs.answer: Embeddable widgets with conversions built in.

faqs.question: Is there a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, one active widget with core features.

faqs.question: How do I install a widget?
faqs.answer: Copy the embed code and paste it before </body> on your site.

html: <tooldrawer-field class='diet-object-manager' type='object-manager' path='sections' add-label='Add section' reorder-label='Manage sections' reorder-title='Manage sections' label-path='title' index-token='__SECTION__' default-item='{"title":"All Questions","faqs":[{"question":"New question","answer":"New answer"}]}' template='<tooldrawer-field type="repeater" path="sections.__SECTION__.faqs" label="Questions" add-label="Add question" labelPath="sections.__SECTION__.title" labelInputLabel="Section" labelPlaceholder="All Questions" labelSize="lg" default-item="{&quot;question&quot;:&quot;New question&quot;,&quot;answer&quot;:&quot;New answer&quot;}" template='<div class="diet-repeater__item-body"><div class="diet-dropdown-edit diet-popover-host" data-size="md" data-state="closed"><div class="diet-dropdown-header diet-dropdown-edit__control" role="button" aria-haspopup="dialog" aria-expanded="false"><span class="diet-dropdown-header-label label-s">Q:</span><span class="diet-dropdown-header-value body-s" data-muted="true" data-placeholder="Type your question">Type your question</span><button class="diet-dropdown-header-icon diet-btn-ic" data-size="md" data-variant="neutral" type="button" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="hand.point.up"></span></button></div><div class="diet-popover" role="dialog" aria-label="Question"><div class="diet-popover__header"><span class="diet-popover__header-label label-s">Q:</span><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic diet-popover__header-trigger" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="textformat.size.larger"></span></button></div><div class="diet-popover__body diet-dropdown-edit__body"><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__main"><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__editor body-xsmall" contenteditable="true">Type your question</div><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__palette"><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__toolbarrow"><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__group diet-dropdown-edit__group--format"><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="bold"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="bold"></span></button><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="italic"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="italic"></span></button><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="underline"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="underline"></span></button><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="strike"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="strikethrough"></span></button><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="link"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="link"></span></button></div><span class="diet-dropdown-edit__divider is-hidden"></span><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__group diet-dropdown-edit__group--clear"><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="clear-format"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="arrow.counterclockwise"></span></button><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="clear-links"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="personalhotspot.slash"></span></button></div></div></div></div></div><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__linksheet" aria-hidden="true"><div class="diet-popaddlink diet-popover" data-state="empty"><div class="diet-popover__header"><span class="diet-popover__header-label label-s">Add URL</span><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic diet-popover__header-trigger" data-size="xs" data-variant="neutral" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="multiply"></span></button></div><div class="diet-popover__body"><div class="diet-textfield" data-size="md"><label class="diet-textfield__control"><span class="diet-textfield__display-label label-s">URL:</span><input type="text" class="diet-textfield__field body-s diet-popaddlink__input" aria-label="URL" placeholder="https://example.com" /></label><span class="diet-textfield__helper caption diet-popaddlink__helper"></span></div><div class="diet-popaddlink__actions"><button type="button" class="diet-btn-txt diet-popaddlink__apply" data-size="md" data-variant="primary"><span class="diet-btn-txt__label">Apply</span></button></div></div></div></div><input type="hidden" class="diet-dropdown-edit__field" value="Type your question" data-bob-path="sections.__SECTION__.faqs.__INDEX__.question" /></div><div class="diet-dropdown-edit diet-popover-host" data-size="md" data-state="closed"><div class="diet-dropdown-header diet-dropdown-edit__control" role="button" aria-haspopup="dialog" aria-expanded="false"><span class="diet-dropdown-header-label label-s">A:</span><span class="diet-dropdown-header-value body-s" data-muted="true" data-placeholder="Type your answer">Type your answer</span><button class="diet-dropdown-header-icon diet-btn-ic" data-size="md" data-variant="neutral" type="button" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="hand.point.up"></span></button></div><div class="diet-popover" role="dialog" aria-label="Answer"><div class="diet-popover__header"><span class="diet-popover__header-label label-s">A:</span><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="textformat.size.larger"></span></button></div><div class="diet-popover__body diet-dropdown-edit__body"><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__main"><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__editor body-xsmall" contenteditable="true">Type your answer</div><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__palette"><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__toolbarrow"><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__group diet-dropdown-edit__group--format"><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="bold"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="bold"></span></button><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="italic"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="italic"></span></button><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="underline"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="underline"></span></button><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="strike"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="strikethrough"></span></button><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="link"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="link"></span></button></div><span class="diet-dropdown-edit__divider is-hidden"></span><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__group diet-dropdown-edit__group--clear"><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="clear-format"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="arrow.counterclockwise"></span></button><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic" data-size="sm" data-variant="neutral" data-command="clear-links"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="personalhotspot.slash"></span></button></div></div></div></div></div><div class="diet-dropdown-edit__linksheet" aria-hidden="true"><div class="diet-popaddlink diet-popover" data-state="empty"><div class="diet-popover__header"><span class="diet-popover__header-label label-s">Add URL</span><button type="button" class="diet-btn-ic diet-popover__header-trigger diet-popaddlink__close" data-size="xs" data-variant="neutral" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"><span class="diet-btn-ic__icon" data-icon="multiply"></span></button></div><div class="diet-popover__body"><div class="diet-textfield" data-size="md"><label class="diet-textfield__control"><span class="diet-textfield__display-label label-s">URL:</span><input type="text" class="diet-textfield__field body-s diet-popaddlink__input" aria-label="URL" placeholder="https://example.com" /></label><span class="diet-textfield__helper caption diet-popaddlink__helper"></span></div><div class="diet-popaddlink__actions"><button type="button" class="diet-btn-txt" data-size="md" data-variant="primary"><span class="diet-btn-txt__label">Apply</span></button></div></div></div></div><input type="hidden" class="diet-dropdown-edit__field" value="Type your answer" data-bob-path="sections.__SECTION__.faqs.__INDEX__.answer" /></div></div>' />' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='lg' databinding='title' path='title' label='FAQ title' hint='Frequently Asked Questions' value='{{title}}' show-if="showTitle == true" />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='displayCategoryTitles' label='Show section title' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.iconStyle' label='Accordion icon' placeholder='Choose icon' value='{{appearance.iconStyle}}' show-if="layout.type == 'accordion'" options='[{"label":"Plus","value":"plus"},{"label":"Chevron","value":"chevron"},{"label":"Arrow One","value":"arrow"},{"label":"Arrow Two","value":"arrowshape"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.expandFirst' label='Open first question by default' show-if="layout.type == 'accordion'" />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.multiOpen' label='Allow multiple open' show-if="layout.type == 'accordion'" />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.expandAll' label='Expand all questions' show-if="layout.type == 'accordion'" />
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-fill' size='md' path='appearance.itemBackground' label='Item background' value='{{appearance.itemBackground}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-fill' size='md' allow-image='false' path='appearance.questionColor' label='Question text color' value='{{appearance.questionColor}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-fill' size='md' allow-image='false' path='appearance.answerColor' label='Answer text color' value='{{appearance.answerColor}}' />
<tooldrawer-field-podstageappearance type='dropdown-fill' size='md' path='pod.background' label='Widget background' value='{{pod.background}}' />
